bio: Joern is a digital artist with knowledge in Javascript, PHP, etc. He is into everything surrounding Graphic Design, Illustrations, Comics, Web Design and everything Open Source. He has a website, upinthesky.net.

role: Works on the icon themes and is the unofficial PR guy.
bio: Georgi is the guy behind the design of Kazam, Unity Tweak Tool, Smuxi, XNoise, Athena and a bundle of more community and third party apps. He is also an Ubuntu member. He writes on omgubuntu.co.uk and his personal blog mechoslav.wordpress.com.

role: Works the Numix GTK themes and the icons themes.
bio: Satya loves to make themes, play with HTML, CSS and bash. He is a member of The Shimmer Project. He also works on some projects of his own, such as Fedora Utils, Elegance Colors etc. You can find his posts on worldofgnome.org.

role: Maintains the repositories and USC packages.
bio: Paolo is passionate about IT, and technology in general. He is a supporter of Open Source Software and an Ubuntu member. He has contributed to many projects including Ubuntu. You can visit his blog at paolorotolo.blogspot.com.
